ygData.subject: Re: Lets find Bidl Frugin
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Zimel of the Zimel s blades quest (aka Soulfire) is just a prisoner but certain keywords trigger him to respond strangely.  Have you tried everything
ygData.messageBody:
>'two-weekers' to say any more so I've skipped them for now. Third, Bidl
>Frugin is not in the Mino Caves in Steamfont, I went throughout the cave
>and could not find him, saw two other slaves though, but they would not
>speak to me. Hummph. I think it might be possible that he is at a
>different Mino camp, but can't be sure.


Zimel of the 'Zimel's blades' quest (aka Soulfire) is just 'a prisoner' but
certain keywords trigger him to respond strangely. Have you tried
everything you can with these two slaves? Just and idea ;)
